thread.title: Shraddha and Aditya take up the relationship test; open up about love, sex and babies – watch video
thread.title_full: Shraddha and Aditya take up the relationship test; open up about love, sex and babies – watch video

author: Pooja Nayak
title: Shraddha and Aditya take up the relationship test; open up about love, sex and babies – watch video
text:
Aditya Roy Kapur and Shraddha Kapoor were all smiles while promoting OK Jaanu in the capital 
We dunno about their current relationship status but we’ve definitely figured out one thing about Shraddha Kapoor and Aditya Roy Kapur after this love test – they are poles apart when it comes to being in love. I mean, no seriously! Ahead of OK Jaanu that hit the screens today, I got the couple to play a candid relationship quiz EXCLUSIVELY on BollywoodLife – just to know what are their expectations from a relationship? When do they plan to get married? Do they ever want to have babies? And boy, while Shraddha was upfront on saying she loves babies, Aditya surprisingly quipped, “I hates babies” In fact, that’s not all. Even when I threw a question about romance or say getting pampered with gifts – Aditya took a step back to say how he would rather prefer useful gifts over memorable ones while Shraddha still stuck by her opinion on being all lovey dovey and wanting her partner to send her flowers, gifts every now and then. Also read: OK Jaanu movie review: Shraddha Kapoor and Aditya Roy Kapur’s aashiqui gets a Mani Ratnam twist 
Trust me, few questions and Shraddha-Aditya proved their idea of a relationship is very different from each other. Probably the only few things they agreed on was when I asked them about marriage as both of them were clueless about it and when I quizzed them about what’s their definition of sex. If you watch this video, you’ll exactly know what I am trying to say. 
For the longest time there were rumours about Shraddha and Aditya’s link-up. But after watching this video, you would get a clearer picture if the couple was ever in love, still in love or are planning to get back together in the future. Nevertheless, if not off screen, Shraddha and Aditya are killing it as lovers in OK Jaanu right now. Have you watched the film? Do share your thoughts in the comments below and keep watching this space for more. Published: January 13, 2017 7:40 pm Topics:
